jml.math.quasimetric
Class Minkowski

java.lang.Object
  jml.math.quasimetric.QuasiMetric
      jml.math.quasimetric.Minkowski
Direct Known Subclasses:
Euclidean
public class Minkowski
extends QuasiMetric

Title: Minkowski

Description: Calculates the Minkowski distance between two real vectors,

without calculating the p-root

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jonatan Gomez

distance

public double distance(java.lang.Object x,
                       java.lang.Object y)
Calculates the Minkowski distance from one real vector to another. This object does not calculate the p-root

Parameters:

y - The second real vector
